thread.title: Great place to stay in Southwark -
thread.title_full: Great place to stay in Southwark - Review of Premier Inn London Southwark (Tate Modern) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Colin W
title: Great place to stay in Southwark -
text: Good location 10 minutes from Southwark Tube, very close to Tate Modern and the Southbank. Nice cafes nearby. Rooms are clean and comfortable. The staff were courteous and helpful. A bit over priced for business stay mid week compared to other brand hotels nearby.
